instruction: Create a 4-sentence synopsis that summarizes the content of the given text.
input: Michael is a 12-year-old from a small town in Iowa who is determined to make a difference in the world. He reads about the struggles of those in developing countries and is frustrated that he can’t do much to help. Together with his best friend, William, he develops a plan for an invention that will bring clean water to those in need.
output: Michael, a 12-year-old from a small town in Iowa, is concerned about the struggles of those in developing countries. He and his best friend, William, hatch a plan to create a device that can bring clean water to those in need. With a combination of Michael’s creativity and William’s resourcefulness, the two embark on a journey to make a difference and help those in need. Despite the challenges they face, they refuse to give up and persist in their mission of creating an invention that can bring clean water to those who desperately need it.
